sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' class ShowRequest extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ reqNO:null, cAddress:null, description:null, amount:null, payable:null, voter:null, donors:null, completed:null, } const Requests=[this.reqNO, this.state.cAddress, this.state.description, this.state.amount, this.state.payable, this.state.voter, this.state.donors, this.state.completed] } weiTOeth=(amount)=>{ const ConvertedAmount=this.props.web3.utils.fromWei(amount); return ConvertedAmount; } componentDidUpdate = async(prevProps,prevState) =>{ if(prevState.reqNo === this.props.reqNO && prevProps.refresh!==this.props.refresh){ const info = await this.props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus().call(); this.setState( {voters : (info[0]), donors : (info[1]), description : info[2], cAddress: (info[3]), recipient: info[4], reqNO:info[5], amount : this.weiTOeth(info[6]), completed:info[7] }); } console.log("ComponenetDidUpdate") console.log("contract=",this.props.contract) console.log('web3=',this.props.web3) } render() { return (
Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors {Requests.map((index) => ( {index.this.reqNo} {index.this.cAddress} {index.this.description} {index.this.amount} {index.this.recipient} {index.this.voters}/{this.donors} ) )}
) } } export default ShowRequest
